content: so bright and beautiful you can t go wrong no matter what colors your choose for this color kaleidoscope crochet blanket pattern materials 4 skeins caron big cakes in summer berry tart you will use 2 skeins at a time n/p 10 0 mm hook yarn needle scissors level easy -you must be very familiar with basic crochet stitches pattern notes & stitches to know chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet approximate finished size 48 x 45
